item.name: All disks read operations in IOPS
All disks write operations in IOPS

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

trigger_prototype.name: Forecast: free disk space will be less then 5% in 1h on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOSTNAME}
Free disk space is be less then 5% on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOSTNAME}
Free disk space is less than 10% on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOSTNAME}
Free disk space is less than 15% on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOSTNAME}
Free inodes is less than 10% on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOSTNAME}

trigger.name: Configured max number of opened files is too low on {HOSTNAME}
CPU idle time is low on {HOSTNAME} for the last 5minutes
trigger.description: CPU Idle is low, trigger will remain 1 till CPU idle is at least 30% for the last 10minutes

trigger.name: CPU load is too high on {HOSTNAME}
CPU steal time is high on {HOSTNAME}
Forecast, memory will be less then 10% in 30m on {HOST.NAME}
Free swap below 10MB for 5 minutes on {HOSTNAME}
Less than 200MB and 5% free memory for 5min on {HOST.NAME}
Load per CPU 15m avg above 0.8 on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: CPU load 15m average above 0.8 per CPU on host

trigger.name: Load per CPU 15m avg above 1 on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: CPU load 15m average above 1 per CPU on host

trigger.name: Load per CPU 15m avg above 5 on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: CPU load 15m average above 5 per CPU on host

trigger.name: Server {HOSTNAME} is unreachable for 5 minutes
trigger.description: Trigger if server unreachable for 8 minutes.

trigger.name: Version of zabbix_agent(d) was changed on {HOSTNAME}
